Config module¶

Config handles the most important parameter setting in the long horizon operation in MASCOT Porto mission 2022. - misssion date: “2022-10-01_2022-10-02” - wind direction: [“North”, “East”, “South”, “West”] - wind level: [“Mild”, “Moderate”, “Heavy”], the corresponding wind speed: [0, 2.5, 6] m/s - clock_start: 10, when does the operation start: 10 o’clock. - clock_end: 16, when does the operation end: 16 o’clock.

  • polygon_operational_area: the polygon used to define the safe operational area.

  • polygon_operational_area_shapely: shapely object to detect collision or border.

  • starting location: (lat, lon) used to define the starting location for the long horizon operation.

  • home location: (lat, lon) used to define the end location for the home in the long horizon operation.

class Config.Config¶

Bases: object

Mission setup.

static get_clock_end() → int¶

Return expected time clock to end the mission.

static get_clock_start() → int¶

Return expected time clock to start the mission.

static get_loc_home() → ndarray¶

Return home location in (x, y).

static get_loc_start() → ndarray¶

Return starting location in (x, y).

static get_mission_date() → str¶

Return pre-set mission date string.

static get_polygon_operational_area() → ndarray¶

Return polygon for the oprational area.

static get_polygon_operational_area_shapely() → Polygon¶

Return shapelized polygon for the operational area.

static get_wind_direction() → str¶

Return pre-set wind direction string.

static get_wind_level() → str¶

Return pre-set wind level string.

static set_clock_end(value: int) → None¶

Set starting clock to be 0, 1, 2, 3, …, 24. Must be larger than MOHID.__clock_start.

static set_clock_start(value: int) → None¶

Set starting clock to be 0, 1, 2, 3, …, 24.

static set_loc_home(loc: ndarray) → None¶

Set the home location with (lat, lon).

static set_loc_start(loc: ndarray) → None¶

Set the starting location with (lat,lon).

static set_mission_date(value: str) → None¶

Set mission date with a format 2022-10-01_2022-10-02.

static set_polygon_operational_area(value: ndarray) → None¶

Set operational area using polygon defined by lat lon coordinates. .. rubric:: Example

value: np.ndarray([[lat1, lon1],

[lat2, lon2], … [latn, lonn]])

static set_wind_direction(value: str) → None¶

Set wind direction to be North, East, South, West.

static set_wind_level(value: str) → None¶

Set wind level to be Mild, Moderate, Heavy.
